contract_details.description: Execute Phase 1 Batch 1B of the systematic cleanup mission: Service Layer Optimization. Merge 20+ service files, eliminate service duplication, standardize service interfaces, and improve service test coverage to >85%.
contract_details.background: Following core architecture consolidation (Batch 1A), this batch focuses on optimizing the service layer to provide clean, standardized interfaces for the consolidated core modules.
objectives: Merge 20+ service files into consolidated service modules
Eliminate service duplication and redundant implementations
Standardize service interfaces across all service types
Improve service test coverage to >85% across all services
Document service dependencies and integration points
Establish service monitoring and health check patterns
deliverables: Consolidated service layer (≤10 primary service modules)
Standardized service interface definitions and contracts
Service health monitoring and alerting integration
technical_requirements: Dependency injection and service locator patterns
Service monitoring and health check implementation
success_criteria: Service module count reduced from 20+ to ≤10 modules
Standardized service interfaces implemented across all services
Service test coverage achieves >85% across all modules
Service dependency documentation complete and validated

dependencies: Agent-5 onboarding completed and role understood
resources_required: Access to src/services/ directory and all service modules
Service interface design patterns and standards
Comprehensive testing framework and CI/CD pipeline
Service monitoring and health check tools
Performance profiling and dependency analysis tools

contract_history.details: Phase 1 Batch 1B contract created for service layer optimization mission
